Content.Title: Level --1--
Content.Description: - In Act 1, your principle objective is to acquire the red key to make the way for the secretive area. In the wake of recapturing authority over the principle hero, go towards the ball. After a short cutscene, you are gotten by the neighbor (unavoidable).
